column2: "Thanks for your great work gathering materials! With Franca's cooperation, we've acquired all sorts of materials."
"Aida in the cafe is also helping out by letting us use her kitchen!"
"Alright, now what sort of sweets should we make? Not just sweet, but with a hint of bitterness too, and plenty of autumn fruits."
"Oh, I have an idea! Kaboom! We've got to make it exciting, like eating a big bang!"
"For now, shall we wait until we know what we want? We'll keep trying, so look forward to what we come up with!"
